oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Macroalgae for an increasing organic market
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Friis Pedersen, Susanne
Meland, Marte
Rebours, Celine
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The production and consumption of organic food has steadily increased since 1985. It has been given political priority in several Nordic countries. Today, macroalgae play an innovative role in The New Nordic Cuisine: content of the macroalgae make them attractive for consumers concerned about food origin and content. Often these attentive consumers also relate to the organic market.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Friis Pedersen, Susanne; Meland, Marte and Rebours, Celine (2013) Macroalgae for an increasing organic market. In: Fløistad , Erling and Günther, Morten (Eds.) Bioforsk FOKUS, Bioforsk, Ås, Norway, 8 (2), Bioforsk FOKUS, pp. 337-338.
